name: Wood Block Puzzle: Brain Game
description:
Wood Block Puzzle is a simple but fun wooden sudoku puzzle game. Unlike the usual block puzzle games, we combine the classic wood block puzzle with sudoku game, eliminating in 9*9 squares, every horizontal and vertical row will be eliminated when filled, in addition to that, every 3*3 grid filled will also be eliminated, adding to the fun of the game while increasing the ways of elimination. Not only that, Wood Block Puzzle is a good partner for your brain, helping you to keep your brain alive, come and challenge your brain!
The goal of Wood Block Puzzle: eliminate as many wood blocks as possible, get more points by eliminating blocks, keep challenging and surpassing yourself!

How To Play
First of all, just like the classic wooden sudoku block elimination game, place blocks to fill a horizontal or vertical row, and the blocks will be eliminated.
Special rule, the wooden blocks fills a big square of 3*3, they will also be eliminated, which increases the way of wooden blocks elimination and brings you a different game experience.
The game can be paused and returned at any time, so you can still keep the game progress without disturbing your normal rest and work.
High score tips: keep the wooden blocks eliminated continuously to get more points and break the high score record.
If you have more and better game tips, welcome to share them with us, we sincerely look forward to your feedback.

Why Chose Us
You can download our wood sudoku game from APP Store for free and start eliminating wooden blocks.
No WiFi limit, you can play our game without internet, so you can experience the wood sudoku game anytime and anywhere.
No need to sign in, just open and start the game, no tedious process, you can quickly enter the game.
Minimalist game style, bring you a relaxed and happy game experience.
No time limit, you can play infinitely and keep challenging yourself.
Soothing and harmonious background music, so that you can experience the release of stress and relaxation of the brain in the game.

During the game, if you have any problems, you can contact us anytime and we sincerely look forward to your feedback.
Wood Block Puzzle can accompany you in your daily leisure time, such as the break after lunch, the fun time at the end of the day, and the time before going to sleep at night, so you won't feel bored anymore.
Download our Wood Block Puzzle and start playing it!
